overview: Ferran Griego imagines hunky Buddy Jones stripping and drinking milk and getting it all over himself while he cums. Buddy looks leaner here than usual -- and while he's still fantastic, we kind of liked him a little fleshier. He still has that humongous dick, though. He also seems to have more of his natural body hair than in earlier appearances. He puts a lot into his performance -- he has a cute, boyish voice and his sex-talk is somehow more convincing and engaging than the usual performer's.
title: Wet Dreams 1
